title: Need Help Identifying this Font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090527115807im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Passion_4706.JPG)

Does anyone know what font this is?  
Thanks. Ü
author: xsalt

comments.content:
Your sample is small but [Digital Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20090527115807/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/digital-sans/) seems at least similar. Might need to be flattened/widened though.

- Mike Yanega

Very similar to Ray Larabie’s old free version of [Zekton](http://web.archive.org/web/20090527115807/http:/www.dafont.com/zekton.font?nb_ppp=50&text=bike).You would need to close the counters on the b and e. (His newer commercial Zekton has a different ’k’, among other changes).

- Mike Yanega
